codeSwitchingInstructions: Some people switch between the languages they know within a single conversation. For example, while speaking in one language they may use sentences or words from the other language. This is known as “code-switching”. Please indicate how often you engage in code-switching.
一些人在同一次对话或交谈中会切换他们所掌握的不同语言。使用两种或多种不同的语言或方言的现象。例如，在用单一语言交流时，他们会使用来自其他语言的句子或词汇。这种现象被称为“语码转换”。请说明您进行语码转换的频率。

If you think there's anything else we should know about you or your background then you can use the box below to tell us about this. Then just click on the “submit and continue” button to save your data and continue with the next task.
